snippet: Scott Schaefer, who has been senior curator of paintings at the J. Paul Getty Museum in Los Angeles since 1999, is retiring in January.
abstract: Scott Schaefer, who has been senior curator of paintings at the J. Paul Getty Museum in Los Angeles since 1999, is retiring in January.

headline.main: A Senior Getty Curator Is Stepping Down
headline.print_headline: Senior Getty Curator Is Stepping Down
